<h2>🚀 About Me</h2>

<picture> <img align="right" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/74038190/240815616-7b282ec6-fcc3-4600-90a7-2c3140549f58.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..VPSq8V_rSG_ucVbehe9T6A6FGG4zavoesV8XVg9eF4U"

- 🎥 Content Creator on <b>[YouTube](https://youtube.com/@kursusTUTOR)</b> 
- 💻 Passionate Web Programmer who enjoys building applications using the MERN stack.
- 🛠️ Focused on performance, developer experience, and clean UI
- 🌱 I’m currently Express and React Framework
- 🧠 Constantly learning & sharing what I learn
- 💬 Ask me about anything, I am happy to help
- 📫 How to reach me: <b>[jeremysantoso98@gmail.com](https://youtube.com/@pedrotechnologies)</b>
